page.title: 15CHILDRENS' GAMES 1985
page.content: {TAG a game for any number of people.One person is on-when he touches someone they are on instead. {BLEEP One person is on.He picks a person to run across to the other side and if he gets caught he is on as well and picks another person to run across. {FOLLOW THE LEADER You have to follow and copy everything that the leader does.you soon find out who uses their eyes. {RIN TIN TIN to play this you need a ball.Someone kicks the ball and the person who is on hasd to go and fetch it while the others hide.He takes the ball back to where it was kicked from then leaves it to try to find the others.They try to sneak back and kick the ball without being noticed.
